articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Superyacht is pulled from the seabed 10 months after sinking off Sicily - ABC News - Breaking News, Latest News and Videos
articles.description: A British-flagged luxury superyacht that sank off Sicily last year, killing U.K. tech magnate Mike Lynch and six others, has partially resurfaced as salvage recovery crews finalize the complex operation to bring it ashore for further investigation
articles.content: ROME -- A British-flagged luxury superyacht that sank off Sicily last year, killing U.K. tech magnate Mike Lynch and six others, partially resurfaced Saturday as salvage recovery crews finalized the … [+2494 chars]
